page.title: 20Craigie Pupils Gratitude.
page.content: The following pupils of Primary 7, Craigie school would like to thank all who gave so willingly of their time to help them in this project: { M.Auld, M.Andrews, R.Barker, S.Clark {C.Colville, A.Coombe, D.Garvie,Iain {Lennie, C.McDonald, P.McFarlane, {S.McNeill, R.Smart, B.Thomson, Carla {Brown, L.Chan, L.Christie, S.Comer, {K.Farquhar, K.Frampton, R.Mann, {C.Martin, A.Murray, S.Ramsay, C.Walton {I.Wilson and D.Mulligan. Thanks go to the classes who gave up their own computer time for us. Special thanks go to our teacher's daughter, Morag Winton, for helping us with the photographs and for taking us to interview people. Many of them said how nice it was to see pleasant,polite youngsters and seemed surprised. That could be because they only hear about young troublemakers. What a pity.
